alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Holmes; Leflore; Montgomery (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 2:28AM CDT until March 12 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Holmes County in central Mississippi... Carroll County in north central Mississippi... Leflore County in north central Mississippi... Southwestern Montgomery County in north central Mississippi... * Until 315 AM CDT. * At 128 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Money to Swiftown, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Avalon around 135 AM CST. Teoc around 140 AM CST. Malmaison around 145 AM CST. North Carrollton around 150 AM CST. Winona and Emory around 305 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Carrollton, Schlater, Morgan City and Cruger. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
